snippet: Europe only earned a rare mention during the course of the U.S. election campaign. But the economic fate of the Continent is likely to loom large in the calculations of whoever occupies the White House for the next four years.
abstract: Europe only earned a rare mention during the course of the U.S. election campaign. But the economic fate of the Continent is likely to loom large in the calculations of whoever occupies the White House for the next four years.

headline.main: Europe's Problems Likely to Loom Post-Election
